message: I propose a 90/10 split.  I'll take the larger share, but this is a fair starting point to see if we can come to a good agreement.
Your offer was heavily skewed in your favor.  I'm proposing a 60/40 split to better reflect the fact that continued negotiation hurts us both.
Let's compromise.  I'm willing to reduce my share to 55%, recognizing that each round hurts us both.  Let's find a solution that benefits us both.
